question: I just came across this article and thought it was a pretty good all around article especially for newcomers.  What is interesting is that it is from the " National Institute of Diabetes and Digestive and Kidney Diseases, National Institutes of Health".http://digestive.niddk.nih.gov/ddiseases/pubs/chronichepc/Denise with a disclaimer-------I did not write the article, I couldn't find a date, I am not saying that everything is absolutely up to date but as always do your own research.---------
title: Pretty good article for newbies and all
